notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This study was funded by a French Government grant managed by the French National Research Agency under the “Investissements d’Avenir” program, reference ANR-11-LABX-0021, and was supported by grants from the Conseil Régional de Bourgogne Franche-Comté, the “Fonds Européen de Développement Régional” (FEDER), and the Bureau Interprofessionnel des Vins de Bourgogne (BIVB).
